Service Details: - Offers an easily accessible multi-use facility with a variety of recreational programs, community and special events- Offers aquatic programs for all ages, weight/circuit room, personal trainer services, fitness instructor training, health and wellness workshops, general interest workshops and programs and community special events- Amenities include 25 metre pool, aquatic wheelchairs and client transport lift, slides, hot tub and steam room, warm soaking pool, and slides, rain maker and Tarzan rope for children
